column4: just tried to run Internet Explorer under Wine (cause I've got to browse a site which is only opens with IE). While the default IE on Wine does'nt open I tried installing IE6 which I was downloaded but it says there's an older version of IE already installed on my pc... what to do?
use an agent switcher in firefox (or whatever browser you use)
it makes the site think you are using a different browser
well, now it's not the site prompting me to use IE ! it's firefox which can't render the webpage !
there is ies4linux but it's not great. Basically the coding for the page sucks
I know the page sucks but I've got to use that as far as it's the site for my university education system !
try ies4linux is all I can suggest, or maybe chromium-browser will do better
its not a apackage, there is a site with a compressed binary, simply extract it and run it
I'd moan at the maintainers and call them lazy
I have seen all your posts in here and I'm sure you have seen mine, so the channel "being dead" is false, and you know it
sure sir, no need to complain
then why say it's dead when you know it isn't?
if the wireless link is 10Mb, you cannot go faster than that
